TEXT.S: Sudan [[Faylo:Sudan (orthographic Sudan projection) highlighted.svg thumb Sudan in dark green, disputed regions in light green.]] Itini i 15 00 N, 30 00 E, noAfilika ko Sudan. Polong no sekalay i 1,861,484 sq km "saka 16 ko rayray no ngangan. " Polong i 36,729,501 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 100 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 0 , malo no roma to a sera 0 . siyoto O [[[Khartoum]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakacecay 1 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Omar al Bashir, patirengan a romi'ad i 1993 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 16 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
